content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.DATABASES WHERE [name] = 'TPCDSDBDemo') 
CREATE DATABASE TPCDSDBDemo
GO

ALTER DATABASE TPCDSDBDemo COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
GO


USE [master]
CREATE LOGIN LoadingUserDemo WITH PASSWORD = 'Msftdemo2022!'
GO

USE [TPCDSDBDemo]
CREATE USER LoadingUserDemo FOR LOGIN LoadingUserDemo; 
GO 

ALTER ROLE db_owner ADD MEMBER LoadingUserDemo;
GO
